components.name: GridColumnOptionsDialog
components.templateData:
<systelab-dialog-header [withInfo]="false" (close)="close();">{{ 'COMMON_OPTIONS' | translate | async }}
</systelab-dialog-header>
<systelab-tabs class="slab-flex-1 slab-overflow-container">
    <systelab-tab [title]="getTabTitle('COMMON_FIELDS')" class="p-2 slab-overflow-container">
        <systelab-two-list class="slab-flex-1 slab-overflow-container"
                           [(available)]="availableColumns"
                           [(visible)]="visibleColumns"
                           [initialAvailableColumns]="initialAvailableColumns">
        </systelab-two-list>
    </systelab-tab>
</systelab-tabs>
<systelab-dialog-bottom>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary ml-auto" id="ID_optionsSubmitButton" [disabled]="visibleColumns.length === 0" (click)="submit()"> {{'COMMON_SUBMIT' | translate | async}}
    </button>
</systelab-dialog-bottom>
